body_html: Hey while we are at it... I am looking for an 3D upsampling and/or unpooling! I Could probably implement it in pure pytorch but not sure that's a good long term solution. I see nn.MaxUnpool3d and it would work if it filled in the local max value instead of the zeros. Could add an option for that?
body_text: Hey while we are at it... I am looking for an 3D upsampling and/or unpooling! I Could probably implement it in pure pytorch but not sure that's a good long term solution. I see nn.MaxUnpool3d and it would work if it filled in the local max value instead of the zeros. Could add an option for that?
body: Hey while we are at it... I am looking for an 3D upsampling and/or unpooling! I Could probably implement it in pure pytorch but not sure that's a good long term solution. I see `nn.MaxUnpool3d` and it would work if it filled in the local max value instead of the zeros. Could add an option for that?
